entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 10. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Snow level 2300 metres lowering to valley bottom overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 6 April 2023
